home.title: Online Image Shrinker - Free Privacy-First Tool
home.description: Compress, resize, and optimize images locally in your browser. No uploads, 100% privacy guaranteed.

compress_jpeg.title: Compress JPEG Images Online - Free & Private
compress_jpeg.description: Reduce JPEG file size by up to 90% without losing quality. Optimize your photos for web and passports instantly.

resize_instagram.title: Resize for Instagram - No Crop & Portrait Mode
resize_instagram.description: Resize images for Instagram Stories, Reels, and Posts. Avoid cropping with our intelligent background tools.

heic_to_jpg.title: Convert HEIC to JPG Online - Instant & Secure
heic_to_jpg.description: Convert iPhone photos (HEIC) to standard JPG format. Works locally in your browser for maximum privacy.

jpg_to_pdf.title: Convert JPG to PDF Online - Merge Images Free
jpg_to_pdf.description: Turn your images into a PDF document in seconds. No upload needed, 100% private and secure.

compress_png.title: Compress PNG Images Online - Transparent & Clear
compress_png.description: Reduce PNG file size while keeping transparency perfect. Best for logos, icons, and graphics.

compress_webp.title: Compress WebP Images - Fast & Efficient
compress_webp.description: Optimize next-gen WebP images for your website. Maximum speed, minimum file size.

resize_passport.title: Resize Photo for Passport (3.5x4.5cm) - Free Online
resize_passport.description: Make biometrically compliant passport photos. US 2x2, UK, EU standards. Face guides included.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Online Image Shrinker
privacy.description: We do not store your data. Learn about our 100% client-side privacy commitment.

signature.title: Digital Signature Creator
signature.tip: Download as PNG to keep the background transparent. Perfect for signing PDFs.

home.title: Select a Tool
home.subtitle: Choose how you want to optimize your images today.

compress.title: Compress Image
compress.desc: Reduce file size while maintaining the best quality.

resize.title: Resize Image
resize.desc: Change dimensions (width & height) by pixels or percentage.

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.desc: Crop for Instagram, YouTube, and other social media platforms.

watermark.title: Watermark
watermark.desc: Protect your work by adding text or logo overlays.

pdf.title: Images to PDF
pdf.desc: Convert multiple images into a single PDF document instantly.

remove_bg.title: Remove Background
remove_bg.desc: Automatically remove image backgrounds in one click.

upscale.title: AI Upscale
upscale.desc: Increase image resolution (2x, 4x) without losing quality.

screenshot.title: Screenshot Mockups
screenshot.desc: Add window frames, shadows, and backgrounds to screenshots.

grid.title: Grid Splitter
grid.desc: Split images into 3x1, 3x2, or 3x3 grids for Instagram.

profile.title: Profile Pic Maker
profile.desc: Create professional profile pictures with custom backgrounds.

redact.title: Privacy Blur
redact.desc: Redact sensitive info, faces, or text from screenshots.

exif.title: EXIF Viewer & Remover
exif.desc: View and remove hidden metadata (GPS, Date) for privacy.

converter.title: Image Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly.

meme.title: Meme Generator
meme.desc: Create viral memes with custom top and bottom text.

palette.title: Palette Generator
palette.desc: Extract beautiful color palettes from any image instantly.

magic_eraser.title: Magic Eraser
magic_eraser.desc: Remove unwanted objects, people, or text from photos instantly with AI.
